- Once Maghrib enters, the time for Asr has ended. So if you missed both, you cannot "combine them with Maghrib" anymore.  
- Instead, you must pray them as **qadÄâ€™**, in sequence: Dhuhr (2, qasr) â†’ Asr (2, qasr) â†’ then Maghrib (3).
